content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 400 Euro per month is a reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot agree to that price. It's far too low for the quality of the apartment and its location. Are you open to negotiating a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 450 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While 450 Euro is more in line with what I'm looking for, I still believe the apartment is worth more. It's a brand-new, unfurnished apartment in the city center, close to all amenities. Are you willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, let's meet in the middle. How about 475 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. The apartment is worth much more than that. It's a prime location with all the modern conveniences. I'm looking for a price that reflects its true value. Are you willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe 475 Euro per month is a fair price for this apartment. If you are not willing to accept this price, then we cannot reach an agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, but I must insist that the apartment is worth more than 475 Euro per month. If you are not willing to negotiate further, then I'm afraid we will have to terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
